author: Universal Pictures
description:
With Earth in sight, the Apollo 13 crew runs final checks—every step critical, every second tense. 

Buy/Rent Apollo 13!
Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Apollo-13-Tom-Hanks/dp/B001JI5DRC/ref=sr_1_1
iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/movie/apollo-13/id299468139
YouTube Movies: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rCK3tBK6IRA
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/movies/details/Apollo_13?id=rCK3tBK6IRA&hl=en_US
Fandango Now: https://www.fandangonow.com/details/movie/apollo-13-1995/1MVc420e882309769966a3c9b7ed6001a8a
VUDU: https://www.vudu.com/content/movies/details/Apollo-13/5828
Universal Pictures Home Entertainment: https://www.uphe.com/movies/apollo-13

Stranded 205,000 miles from Earth in a crippled spacecraft, astronauts Jim Lovell (Hanks), Fred Haise (Paxton) and Jack Swigert (Bacon) fight a desperate battle to survive. Meanwhile, at Mission Control, astronaut Ken Mattingly (Sinise), flight director Gene Kranz (Harris) and a heroic ground crew race against time - and the odds - to
title: Preparing for Re-Entry 🚀#Apollo13 #Shorts

author: Universal Pictures
description:
How do you take a show beloved in living rooms worldwide and turn it into a movie event? In this episode of Seen on the Screen, Jacqueline Coley sits down with Laila Lockhart Kraner, the star of Gabby’s Dollhouse: The Movie, to talk about the leap from small screen to DreamWorks’ first live-action/animation hybrid feature.

Laila shares the story of growing up alongside Gabby, from her cat-filled audition at age ten to leading a film that brings the dollhouse to theaters for the first time. She opens up about acting opposite comedy icon Kristen Wiig and music legend Gloria Estefan, and why the movie’s interactive, sing-and-dance moments demand to be experienced in a packed theater. We also hear about Laila’s cinephile side—from comfort rewatches like The Croods and Napoleon Dynamite to classics like Roman Holiday—and how those films have shaped her own love of storytelling.

Follow and listen to Seen on the Screen with Jacqueline Coley wherever you listen to podcasts 🎧
· Apple Podcast
title: Gabby’s Dollhouse on the Big Screen with Laila Lockhart Kraner|Seen on the Screen w/Jacqueline Coley
